languages.text: {n}Маражай следит за вашим лицом, ловя каждое движение. Его голос обретает знакомые вам бархатистые нотки.{/n} "Я чувствую оттенки разочарования в твоей душе... но разве я дал для него повод? Нам хорошо вдвоем. И дальше... дальше будет лишь больше страстей и безумия. Ведь ты же сам{mf||а} принял{mf||а} правила. Сам{mf||а} следовал{mf||а} тому, что я предлагал тебе. Тебя вела собственная воля, зовущая к удовольствиям... в противном случае твое положение действительно незавидно — ведь ты превратил{mf|ся|ась} в чудовище для своего вида, стремясь угодить моим вкусам и удержать меня подле себя. Это же... не так?" {n}Взгляд темно-бирюзовых глаз становится опаляющим — и вы не понимаете, издевается ли Маражая или спрашивает всерьез.{/n}

{n}Marazhai watches your face, tracking every movement. His voice takes on the velvety quality now familiar to you.{/n} "I can sense the twinges of disappointment in your soul... but did I give you any cause for it? We are good together. And beyond that... beyond that there will only be more passion and madness. After all, you accepted the rules. You pursued what I offered to you. You were led by your own will, which clamoured for pleasure... If you were not, then your position truly is unenviable — for you have become a monster to your own kind while seeking to please my tastes and keep me close to you. That cannot be so... Can it?" {n}The look in the dark turquoise eyes turns scorching, and you do not know if Marazhai is mocking you or sincerely asking.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋仔细地观察着你的表情，没有遗漏一丝波动。他的声音带着某种你早已非常熟悉的天鹅绒质感。{/n}“我能感觉到你发自灵魂的失望……可我做过什么让你失望的事情吗？我们在一起很快乐，而除此之外……除此之外，只有无穷无尽的激情与疯狂。毕竟，你接受了我的规则，你渴望我给你的东西。你在自身欲望的驱使下，追求更多的快乐……如果不是你自己想要享受这种快乐，那沦落至此就太可悲了。在你的同族眼中，你已经沦为了堕落的怪物。难道你这么做，只是为了迎合我的口味，渴望与我亲近？这是不可能的……没错吧？”{n}那双墨绿色的双眼中射出灼热的目光。你不知道玛拉斋是在嘲笑你，还是在真诚地发问。{/n}

And beyond that... beyond that there will only be more passion and madness. After all, you accepted the rules. You pursued what I offered to you. You were led by your own will, which clamoured for pleasure... If you were not, then your position truly is unenviable — for you have become a monster to your own kind while seeking to please my tastes and keep me close to you. That cannot be so... Can it?" {n}The look in the dark turquoise eyes turns scorching, and you do not know if Marazhai is mocking you or sincerely asking.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai contempla tu rostro, siguiendo todos tus movimientos. Su voz adquiere el tono aterciopelado que tan familiar te resulta ya.{/n} «Noto unas punzadas de decepción en tu alma... ¿pero acaso te he dado yo motivos para ello? Somos buenos juntos. Aparte de eso... aparte de eso únicamente habría más pasión y locura. Al fin y al cabo, aceptaste las reglas. Experimentaste lo que te ofrecí. Te dejaste guiar por tu propia voluntad, que clamaba por más placeres... De no haber sido así, entonces no envidio para nada tu posición, pues te habrías convertido en un monstruo para los de tu propia especie en tu vano intento por complacerme y mantenerme cerca de ti. Pero no es eso lo que ha ocurrido... ¿verdad?». {n}La mirada de sus ojos de color turquesa oscuro se torna abrasadora, y eres incapaz de distinguir si Marazhai se está burlando de ti o si se trata de una pregunta genuina.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai watches your face, tracking every movement. His voice takes on the velvety quality now familiar to you.{/n} "I can sense the twinges of disappointment in your soul... but did I give you any cause for it? We are good together. And beyond that... beyond that there will only be more passion and madness. After all, you accepted the rules. You pursued what I offered to you. You were led by your own will, which clamoured for pleasure... If you were not, then your position truly is unenviable — for you have become a monster to your own kind while seeking to please my tastes and keep me close to you. That cannot be so... Can it?" {n}The look in the dark turquoise eyes turns scorching, and you do not know if Marazhai is mocking you or sincerely asking.{/n}

Te dejaste guiar por tu propia voluntad, que clamaba por más placeres... Pero no es eso lo que ha ocurrido... ¿verdad?». {n}La mirada de sus ojos de color turquesa oscuro se torna abrasadora, y eres incapaz de distinguir si Marazhai se está burlando de ti o si se trata de una pregunta genuina.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous dévisage attentivement, guettant la moindre de réaction. Sa voix prend le ton velouté qui vous est désormais familier.{/n} « Je perçois un sentiment de déception qui ronge votre âme... mais qu'ai-je fait pour le causer ? Nous allons si bien ensemble. Et le futur... nous réserve encore davantage de passion et de folie. Après tous, vous avez approuvé les conditions. Vous avez accepté ce que je vous ai offert. Vous vous êtes {mf|laissé|laissée} guider par votre propre volonté, en quête de jouissance... Dans le cas contraire, votre position serait vraiment déplaisante : vous seriez {mf|devenu|devenue} un monstre aux yeux de votre propre espèce afin de me plaire et de me garder près de vous. Mais ce n'est pas le cas... n'est-ce pas ? » {n}Il darde un regard ardent sur vous et vous ne parvenez pas à lire dans ses yeux turquoise s'il se moque de vous ou s'il vous questionne sincèrement.{/n}

And beyond that... beyond that there will only be more passion and madness. After all, you accepted the rules. You pursued what I offered to you. You were led by your own will, which clamoured for pleasure... If you were not, then your position truly is unenviable — for you have become a monster to your own kind while seeking to please my tastes and keep me close to you. That cannot be so... Can it?" {n}The look in the dark turquoise eyes turns scorching, and you do not know if Marazhai is mocking you or sincerely asking.{/n}

Mais ce n'est pas le cas... n'est-ce pas ? » {n}Il darde un regard ardent sur vous et vous ne parvenez pas à lire dans ses yeux turquoise s'il se moque de vous ou s'il vous questionne sincèrement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai mustert dich und verfolgt jede deiner Bewegungen. Seine Stimme nimmt wieder den dir schon vertrauten samtigen Unterton an.{/n} "Ich spüre einen Anflug von Enttäuschung in Eurer Seele ... aber hat das irgendetwas mit mir zu tun? Wir sind zusammen. Und darüber hinaus ... werden noch mehr Leidenschaft und Wahnsinn folgen. Denn Ihr habt doch den Regeln zugestimmt. Ihr habt genau das verfolgt, was ich Euch angeboten habe. Dabei habt Ihr Euch von Eurem eigenen Willen leiten lassen und der hungerte nun mal nach Vergnügen ... Sollte es nicht Euer Willen gewesen sein, dann ist Eure Situation wahrlich nicht zu beneiden – denn dann seid Ihr zu einem ganz eigenen Monster verkommen, obwohl Ihr nur meinen Geschmack befriedigen wolltet und ich in Eurer Nähe bleiben sollte. Das kann aber nicht sein ... Oder?" {n}Der Blick in seinen dunkeltürkisfarbenen Augen wirkt jetzt brennend und du bist dir unsicher, ob Marazhai dich verspottet oder seine Frage tatsächlich aufrichtig gemeint ist.{/n}

And beyond that... beyond that there will only be more passion and madness. After all, you accepted the rules. You pursued what I offered to you. You were led by your own will, which clamoured for pleasure... If you were not, then your position truly is unenviable — for you have become a monster to your own kind while seeking to please my tastes and keep me close to you. That cannot be so... Can it?" {n}The look in the dark turquoise eyes turns scorching, and you do not know if Marazhai is mocking you or sincerely asking.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはあなたの顔を見て、一挙手一投足を追いかける。彼の声はベルベットのような質感を帯びている。それは、今では馴染み深いものだった。{/n}「俺にはお前の魂が失望の疼きを感じるのがわかる…だが、その原因を与えたのは俺か？俺たちは相性がいい。そしてその先には…情熱と狂気があるだけだ。結局のところ、お前はルールを受け入れたのさ。お前は俺様が提供したものを追い求めた。歓びを求める己の意志に導かれたのさ…もしそうでなかったとしたら、お前の立場ってのは、まったくもって羨ましくないものだ。俺を喜ばせ、近くにとどめようとする一方で、己の同族にとっては怪物になってしまったのだから。そんなはずはない…そうだろう？」{n}濃いターコイズブルーの瞳に映るものが灼熱へと変わる。マラズハイが嘲笑しているのか、それとも心からの問いかけなのか、あなたにはわからない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai watches your face, tracking every movement. His voice takes on the velvety quality now familiar to you.{/n} "I can sense the twinges of disappointment in your soul... but did I give you any cause for it? We are good together. And beyond that... beyond that there will only be more passion and madness. After all, you accepted the rules. You pursued what I offered to you. You were led by your own will, which clamoured for pleasure... If you were not, then your position truly is unenviable — for you have become a monster to your own kind while seeking to please my tastes and keep me close to you. That cannot be so... Can it?" {n}The look in the dark turquoise eyes turns scorching, and you do not know if Marazhai is mocking you or sincerely asking.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yüzünü izleyen Marazhai, her bir hareketini takip ediyor. Sesi, aşina olduğun o kadifemsi tona dönüşüyor.{/n} "Hayal kırıklığının ruhunda yarattığı azabı sezebiliyorum ama... Bunun için sana bir neden verdim mi? Birlikte iyiyiz. Bunun da ötesinde... Bunun ötesinde yalnızca daha fazla tutku ve çılgınlık olabilir. Ne de olsa kuralları kabul ettin. Sana sunduklarımın peşine düştün. Haz için feryat koparan kendi iradeni izledin... Aksi hâlde bulunduğun konum, gerçekten de tatsız olurdu. Çünkü sen, zevklerimi tatmin etmek ve beni yanında tutmak için kendi türünün gözünde bir canavara dönüştün. Böyle... Olamaz, değil mi?" {n}Koyu turkuaz rengi gözlerindeki bakış, yakıcı bir hâl alıyor. Marazhai seninle alay mı ediyor yoksa samimiyetle mi soruyor, çözemiyorsun.{/n}

And beyond that... beyond that there will only be more passion and madness. After all, you accepted the rules. You pursued what I offered to you. You were led by your own will, which clamoured for pleasure... Bunun için sana bir neden verdim mi? Birlikte iyiyiz. Bunun da ötesinde... Bunun ötesinde yalnızca daha fazla tutku ve çılgınlık olabilir. Ne de olsa kuralları kabul ettin. Çünkü sen, zevklerimi tatmin etmek ve beni yanında tutmak için kendi türünün gözünde bir canavara dönüştün. Böyle... Olamaz, değil mi?" {n}Koyu turkuaz rengi gözlerindeki bakış, yakıcı bir hâl alıyor. Marazhai seninle alay mı ediyor yoksa samimiyetle mi soruyor, çözemiyorsun.{/n}
